member.name: T:BookPubDB.Model.Book
member.summary: Represents a book that has a title, publish date, base price, and an associated author and cover.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Book.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the book.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Book.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the book.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Book.PublishDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the publish date of the book.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Book.BasePrice
member.summary: Gets or sets the base price of the book.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Book.Author
member.summary: Gets or sets the author of the book.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Book.AuthorId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the author of the book.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Book.Cover
member.summary: Gets or sets the cover of the book.
